description: Search hotels by city, state, country, or geolocation and explore detailed property info. Check live availability, compare rates and room types, and review boards and promotions. Create ready-to-book links with preselected rooms, rates, supplements, and optional guest details.

tools.name: get_availability
tools.title: Check Hotel Availability and Pricing
tools.description: Search hotel room availability and pricing for specific dates and occupancy.

images.description: Dictionary mapping room_key to list of room pictures with properties for displaying in booking cards

options.description: Available booking options with all keys needed for booking tools

tools.name: get_calendar
tools.title: Check Hotel Availability and Pricing Calendar

annotations.title: Check Hotel Availability and Pricing Calendar

tools.description:
Search hotel calendar availability and pricing.

    **When to use**: When specific dates are not available, use this to suggest closest available dates or alternatives

tools.name: get_booking_additional_services
tools.title: Get Additional Services for Booking Option

annotations.title: Get Additional Services for Booking Option

tools.description:
Get additional services available for a booking selection.

    **When to use**: After user selects a booking option from availability search, to get additional services available for that option.

selected_booking_options.description: Selected Booking options from availability search

senior.description: Price per senior (optional, for special services)

PriceInfo.description: Price information for different age groups

ServiceFilters.description: Filters that apply to the service

ServicePicture.description: Extended picture information for additional services

type.description: Service type: 'Por Habitacion' (per room) or 'Por Persona' (per person)

extras.description: Additional configurations. For PortAventura, contains 'port_aventura' with detailed daily ticket options

prices.description: Simple price list for services without daily variation (e.g., cuna)

release.description: Days before arrival for booking (-1 for no restriction)

prices_per_day.description: Standard pricing by date (YYYY-MM-DD -> 'all' -> availability list)

AdditionalService.description: Additional service for upselling (transfers, activities, extras, etc.).

DailyAvailability.description: Availability and pricing for a specific day

services.description: Available additional services (transfers, activities, extras) for the booking

outputSchema.description: MCP Response containing only the list of additional services

tools.name: get_booking_url
tools.title: Generate Booking Link
tools.description: Generate booking url with preselected room, rate, meal plan, supplements. If no room_preselection is provided, it will generate a booking url showing available options.

supplement_days.description: Number of days for the supplement if it is a daily supplement

room_preselection.description: Needed if you want a prebuilt booking with preselected room, rate, meal plan, supplements, and prefilled guest details

tools.name: search_hotels_by_area
tools.title: Search Hotels by Area
tools.description: Search for hotels in a specific area

area.description: Area name, can be a city, state or province

tools.name: search_hotels_by_geo_location
tools.title: Search Hotels by GPS Location
tools.description: Search for hotels near GPS coordinates within a specified radius, sorted by distance.

tools.name: get_all_hotels
tools.title: Get All Hotels
tools.description: Get paginated list of all hotels by the System

tools.name: get_hotel_by_name
tools.title: Get Hotel by Name
tools.description: Retrieve hotels based on distance-search algorithms
